title: /usr/bin/nvidia-container-runtime: no such file or directory: unknown

content.raw:
./run\_docker\_compose.sh  
Starting docker\_sim\_1 ... error

ERROR: for docker\_sim\_1  Cannot start service sim: OCI runtime create failed: unable to retrieve OCI runtime error \(open /run/containerd/io.containerd.runtime.v1.linux/moby/039b44061644400f4a12d6abc527e4a490b9a6956a650bf1e5ef301aa0f431cc/log.json: no such file or directory\): fork/exec /usr/bin/nvidia-container-runtime: no such file or directory: unknown

ERROR: for sim  Cannot start service sim: OCI runtime create failed: unable to retrieve OCI runtime error \(open /run/containerd/io.containerd.runtime.v1.linux/moby/039b44061644400f4a12d6abc527e4a490b9a6956a650bf1e5ef301aa0f431cc/log.json: no such file or directory\): fork/exec /usr/bin/nvidia-container-runtime: no such file or directory: unknown  
ERROR: Encountered errors while bringing up the project.

‌

I suspect this is from the lines added to /etc/docker/daemon.json per [https://github.com/docker/compose/issues/6691](https://github.com/docker/compose/issues/6691)

ls /usr/bin/nv\*  
/usr/bin/nvidia-bug-report.sh           /usr/bin/nvidia-debugdump  
/usr/bin/nvidia-container-cli           /usr/bin/nvidia-detector  
/usr/bin/nvidia-container-runtime-hook  /usr/bin/nvidia-persistenced  
/usr/bin/nvidia-container-toolkit       /usr/bin/nvidia-settings  
/usr/bin/nvidia-cuda-mps-control        /usr/bin/nvidia-smi  
/usr/bin/nvidia-cuda-mps-server         /usr/bin/nvidia-xconfig

apt list --installed |grep nvid

libnvidia-cfg1-430/now 430.40-0ubuntu0~gpu18.04.1 amd64 \[installed,upgradable to: 430.50-0ubuntu0.18.04.1\]  
libnvidia-common-430/now 430.40-0ubuntu0~gpu18.04.1 all \[installed,upgradable to: 430.50-0ubuntu0.18.04.1\]  
libnvidia-compute-430/now 430.40-0ubuntu0~gpu18.04.1 amd64 \[installed,upgradable to: 430.50-0ubuntu0.18.04.1\]  
libnvidia-container-tools/bionic,now 1.0.5-1 amd64 \[installed,automatic\]  
libnvidia-container1/bionic,now 1.0.5-1 amd64 \[installed,automatic\]  
libnvidia-decode-430/now 430.40-0ubuntu0~gpu18.04.1 amd64 \[installed,upgradable to: 430.50-0ubuntu0.18.04.1\]  
libnvidia-encode-430/now 430.40-0ubuntu0~gpu18.04.1 amd64 \[installed,upgradable to: 430.50-0ubuntu0.18.04.1\]  
libnvidia-fbc1-430/now 430.40-0ubuntu0~gpu18.04.1 amd64 \[installed,upgradable to: 430.50-0ubuntu0.18.04.1\]  
libnvidia-gl-430/now 430.40-0ubuntu0~gpu18.04.1 amd64 \[installed,upgradable to: 430.50-0ubuntu0.18.04.1\]  
libnvidia-ifr1-430/now 430.40-0ubuntu0~gpu18.04.1 amd64 \[installed,upgradable to: 430.50-0ubuntu0.18.04.1\]  
nvidia-compute-utils-430/now 430.40-0ubuntu0~gpu18.04.1 amd64 \[installed,upgradable to: 430.50-0ubuntu0.18.04.1\]  
nvidia-container-toolkit/bionic,now 1.0.5-1 amd64 \[installed\]  
nvidia-dkms-430/now 430.40-0ubuntu0~gpu18.04.1 amd64 \[installed,upgradable to: 430.50-0ubuntu0.18.04.1\]  
nvidia-driver-430/now 430.40-0ubuntu0~gpu18.04.1 amd64 \[installed,upgradable to: 430.50-0ubuntu0.18.04.1\]  
nvidia-kernel-common-430/now 430.40-0ubuntu0~gpu18.04.1 amd64 \[installed,upgradable to: 430.50-0ubuntu0.18.04.1\]  
nvidia-kernel-source-430/now 430.40-0ubuntu0~gpu18.04.1 amd64 \[installed,upgradable to: 430.50-0ubuntu0.18.04.1\]  
nvidia-prime/bionic-updates,bionic-updates,now 0.8.8.2 all \[installed,automatic\]  
nvidia-settings/bionic,now 418.56-0ubuntu0~gpu18.04.1 amd64 \[installed,automatic\]  
nvidia-utils-430/now 430.40-0ubuntu0~gpu18.04.1 amd64 \[installed,upgradable to: 430.50-0ubuntu0.18.04.1\]  
xserver-xorg-video-nvidia-430/now 430.40-0ubuntu0~gpu18.04.1 amd64 \[installed,upgradable to: 430.50-0ubuntu0.18.04.1\]

‌

docker run --gpus all nvidia/cuda:9.0-base nvidia-smi

and 

./run.bash osrf/subt-virtual-testbed tunnel\_circuit\_practice.ign robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1\_SENSOR\_CONFIG\_1

do appear to be working.

‌

./run_docker_compose.sh
Starting docker_sim_1 ... error

ERROR: for docker_sim_1 Cannot start service sim: OCI runtime create failed: unable to retrieve OCI runtime error (open /run/containerd/io.containerd.runtime.v1.linux/moby/039b44061644400f4a12d6abc527e4a490b9a6956a650bf1e5ef301aa0f431cc/log.json: no such file or directory): fork/exec /usr/bin/nvidia-container-runtime: no such file or directory: unknown

ERROR: for sim Cannot start service sim: OCI runtime create failed: unable to retrieve OCI runtime error (open /run/containerd/io.containerd.runtime.v1.linux/moby/039b44061644400f4a12d6abc527e4a490b9a6956a650bf1e5ef301aa0f431cc/log.json: no such file or directory): fork/exec /usr/bin/nvidia-container-runtime: no such file or directory: unknown
ERROR: Encountered errors while bringing up the project.

‌

I suspect this is from the lines added to /etc/docker/daemon.json per https://github.com/docker/compose/issues/6691
